content.rendered:
Your Tickets at the Mercedes-Benz Superdome

One of the country’s most beloved stadiums, the Mercedes-Benz Superdome will play host to the 2018 Sugar Bowl. The Superdome has quite the resume; not only is it the annual host of the Sugar Bowl and home to the NFL’s New Orleans Saints, it has also hosted the Super Bowl seven times as well as a long list of other exciting events. A number of recent renovations have completely modernized the stadium, which features a number of enhancements including new seats and improved sight lines as well as impressive new LED scoreboards and new lighting. With a capacity of over 70,000, the atmosphere will be electric and both the Superdome and New Orleans are eager to impress and entertain football fans from all over the country!

Standard Package Seating Categories

Upper Level End / Corner
601-608 / 620-634 / 646-652

Lower Level End / Corner
101-108 / 120-136 / 148-156

Upper Level Side
611-617 / 637-643

Lower Level Side
111-117 / 139-145
